basics.name: Kehe Ye
basics.summary: Senior undergraduate student at Shenzhen University majoring in Software Engineering. Research interests in robotics, embodied AI, and reinforcement learning.

work.name: AgiBot Teleoperation Group
highlights: Adapted and deployed edge-side models including DP, ACT, and RDT for robotic teleoperation systems
Developed semi-automatic data collection algorithms and co-authored paper FieldGen on data generation

work.name: Tencent IaaS Frontier Technology Group
highlights: Developed traffic generation test tools and performance metrics for TCP congestion control systems
Optimized network stack Connection Manager architecture, achieving 2× throughput improvement
Contributed to tRPC-CPP protocol standardization and system observability improvements

awards.title: Gold Medal
awards.awarder: 2023 Guangdong Collegiate Programming Contest / CCPC Provincial Contest

awards.title: Gold Medal
awards.awarder: 2022 Pony.ai Cup Guangdong Collegiate Programming Contest

awards.title: First Prize
awards.awarder: 2018 NOIP (National Olympiad in Informatics in Provinces) Zhejiang

publications.name: FieldGen: From Teleoperated Pre-Manipulation Trajectories to Field-Guided Data Generation
publications.summary: W. Wang*, K. Ye*, X. Zhou*, T. Chen*, C. Min, Q. Zhu, X. Yang, Y. Shen, Y. Yang, M. Yao, Y. Mu† (* Equal Contribution, † Corresponding Author)

portfolio.name: Tsinghua RCore Operating System
portfolio.description: Implemented comprehensive OS features including multi-level page tables, virtual memory, system calls, time-sharing multitasking, and priority scheduling using Rust and RISC-V

portfolio.name: Multivariate Long-horizon Time Series Forecasting based on DLinear
portfolio.description: Enhanced DLinear model with RevIN normalization and multi-frequency decomposition, achieving 30% robustness improvement and 25.7% better metrics while maintaining 10× faster inference than Transformer baselines
